short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block users in SlateStarCodex and Unsong comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The comments sections over at SlateStarCodex.com often run long, but not everyone is going to be discussing things you care about. This extension adds a feature: click on a user's avatar to hide their comments now and on all other threads. Their comments will be collapsed as if you'd clicked 'hide', including hiding all child comments.
